div.p: NARRATOR: Similar to state dependent learning is withdrawal learning. Withdrawal learning can trick us in a similar way, but at a different point in a drinking or drug use episode.
NARRATOR: The first time I drink or use to cure a hangover in the orange phase, I learn, "If I feel bad, using will make me feel better."
NARRATOR: In the red phase, when I fear I am dying during withdrawal and I take another drink or drug, the feeling of dying stops. This is very powerful learning.
